en.title: Malaysia National Men's Doubles Badminton Player, Lee Wan Wah wearing FE's Quantum Pendant. FE wishes Lee Wan Wah success in the Beijing Olympic Games!
en.content: Although they are different in every way, shuttlers Lee Wan Wah (left) and Choong Tan Fook share one dream - winning the Olympic gold
